item.description:
eva 978-857-6626

Lets get together and dance to White Lightnin they can entertain you on an energetic sextet that combines with Rhythm and Blues, Funky Soul, and Popular Rock (both past and contemporary) to popular swing and Jazz.

Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER AND TIP YOUR SERVERS!!

No cover charge!!!

Joint venture with 5 groups.

Band starts 9pm-1am

Also Celebrating my very good friends birthdays Nance  and Jeff, if any one else has a birthday come on out and  help us celebrate!!!!

Dinner is your choice just put it in your RSVP..no cover great food.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Eva Meet Up sign

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Live Band And Party Celebration!!!!
